item.title: T. Rowe Price shares jump after deal where Goldman will invest $1 billion in asset manager
item.description: Goldman will buy up to $1 billion in T. Rowe Price common stock through open market purchases with the intention to own up to 3.5%.

item.title: Friday's jobs report could confirm a slowing labor market. But will stocks care?
item.description: Just how much it does will matter to investors.

item.title: Stephen Miran says he'll take unpaid leave from White House job while serving as Fed governor
item.description: Miran said he wouldn't fully resign from his position at the White House while serving out the Fed Governor's term, which expires Jan. 31, 2026.

item.title: Stocks making the biggest moves midday: Gap, American Eagle, Salesforce, Figma and more
item.description: These are the stocks posting the largest moves during midday trading.

item.title: Stocks making the biggest moves premarket: Salesforce, American Eagle, Hewlett Packard Enterprise and more
item.description: These are the stocks posting the largest moves in premarket trading.
